section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Law enforcement agency" means a State, county, or municipal police department or agency, or a sheriff's department.
The Department of State Police shall establish a Blue Alert Program to provide a system for rapid dissemination of information to assist in locating and apprehending a missing offender.

text.section: A law enforcement officer or agency that apprehends a missing offender who is the subject of a Blue Alert immediately shall notify the Department of State Police and the law enforcement agency that filed the report resulting in the Blue Alert that the missing offender has been apprehended.
